Reviews.Review Body: Very tight fit but great quality

Reviews.Review Title: These are actually American sizing and reasonable quality
Reviews.Review Body: I ordered two, expecting that given the price, they would be "Chinese Sizing" as a lot of online clothing is. I'm quite a large guy, and take a 2XL American sizing, so it's hard to find clothing online. If I order a 2XL from most places, it turns out to be 2XL for Asian men. So more like an American Medium. Generally I find that if you go from Chinese produced clothing to American, you need to step down 2 sizes to get an accurate idea of what you are getting.So, I was expecting a 3XL to be about an XL. Nope. It really is a 3XL. So... they are a bit big on me, which is fine. I am sure that like most cotton clothing, they'll shrink a bit in the wash, and I like things a bit loose on me for comfort. So overall I am pleasantly surprised and am likely to order some more.A couple of minor issues:One of them, the threading came out of the seam on the collar in the package, leaving a one inch hole. It was the work of 2 minutes to mend it with a needle and thread, so not worth making a stink about. But it means the quality control is kinda poor. The second was fine.The other thing which is a bit disappointing... I ordered black. Their black is a very dark grey or light charcoal. It's what you would expect from a very faded black t-shirt. So if you want actual black, you'll maybe need to dye them.Overall however, and at the price, they are actually very good. They lose a star for the issues above, but honestly... knowing what I am going to get, I'll order again. I'll just have a bottle of Rit on hand to darken them, and maybe a needle and thread for the collars just in case.
Fits well soft and nice length very happy with both sweaters good quality

Very disappointed the size said medium but the size was extra large. I ordered white as well and the size was right. They were not expensive so I did not send back. Will never order again. It is not worth the one star.

as the title says, the quality on person feels surprisingly questionable and isn't the best, but god damn do I look so fly wearing this with the right outfits, I recommend folding the neck part in a big for the added styling.

Excellent quality and beautiful fit.Unfortunately the quality of women’s turtlenecks is often cheaply made so I resort to buying men’s turtlenecks. I bought an XL but I could’ve gone with a medium or even Large. Beautifully made, beautiful fit. Truly Black not a strange off black that is often sold online. 5⭐️
J'aime beaucoup les matériaux, très confortable ,j'ai prise une taille médium et ça me va parfaitement, je pense en racheter prochainement dans d'autres couleurs 😊

Reviews.Review Title: It shapes to your body, and it's also quite thin.
Reviews.Review Body: It fits, and the material or whatever they used, was quite thin.. Which I guess can be useful for the warmer weather, but still. This also tends to shape to your body like a compression shirt, except it's not. This is a turtleneck. Otherwise, this is fine.
